report.title: Unapproved square allocations
report.description: Squares which users have allocated to themselves need to be listed for approval.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM person_attribute_values pav JOIN locations l on l.id=pav.int_value AND l.deleted=false JOIN users u on u.person_id=pav.person_id AND u.id=pav.updated_by_id AND u.deleted=false JOIN users_websites uw on u.id=uw.user_id AND uw.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_registration_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) JOIN people p on p.id=u.person_id AND p.deleted=false WHERE pav.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND pav.deleted=false AND #website_filter#

param.name: user_square_attr_id
param.display: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

param.name: ignore_registration_dates_before
param.description: Ignore anyone who registered earlier than this date where working out if a square has been allocated or not.

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any squares created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.
